author.name: carl carrie
author.description: Meanderings on markets, maths, miasmas, multiverses, mayhem...maybe more. Views are my own. On Bloomberg Type: "Tweets from Carl Carrie" OR "NH TWT_CARLCARRIE"

wikipedia.title: MetaQuotes Language MQL4/MQL5
wikipedia.summary: MQL4 (MetaQuotes Language 4) and MQL5 (MetaQuotes Language 5) are integrated programming languages designed for developing trading robots, technical market indicators, scripts and function libraries.
